description: Best practices for continuous PCI DSS compliance program governance.

sections.title: Why Compliance is a Year-Round Activity
sections.content: Compliance cannot be a once-a-year checklist exercise. PCI DSS v4.0 Appendix A3 emphasizes building scalable, sustainable programs with active control validation throughout the year.

sections.title: Continuous Compliance Best Practices
content: ✅ Assign a dedicated PCI Governance Leader accountable for the program.
✅ Assign control owners and establish quarterly review calendars.
✅ Conduct quarterly risk assessments for emerging threats.
✅ Implement continuous logging and monitoring validation.
✅ Include PCI validation in all significant business or infrastructure changes.
✅ Deliver role-based security training annually and upon significant change.
✅ Conduct incident response simulations annually, including rogue PAN detection.
